title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Back: A Comprehensive Report on Recent Attacks Against Hezbollah’s Military and Terror Infrastructure”

content.rendered:
IDF spokesperson:

Within a few minutes, an aircraft attacked a launcher from which rockets were fired into Israeli territory, and operatives who carried out the shooting; the IDF attacked military buildings and terror infrastructure of the Hezbollah terror organization.

A short time ago, fighter jets and aircraft attacked terror infrastructure and military positions of the Hezbollah terror organization in the vicinity of Kfar Chamaam.
One of the military positions served the organization’s operatives to launch rockets into Mount Dov earlier today. The position and the operatives who carried out the launches were attacked promptly by an air force aircraft.

Yesterday, military buildings and terror infrastructure of the organization in the areas of Blida and Einata were attacked.

Earlier today, IDF forces carried out shooting to remove a threat in the Ita al-Shaab area by artillery means.

A short time ago, several launches were identified from Lebanon towards several areas in the north of the country, no casualties.

Attached is documented footage of the strikes: https://bit.ly/4agxm5R
